entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McPherson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McPherson Airport 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
